body.name: Graco Tranzitions 3 in 1 Harness Booster Seat, Proof
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 7 mins
body.description: Graco Transitions 3-in-1 harness booster car seat is designed to grow with your child and go with you, wherever your journeys take you - from car to carpool and beyond. This lightweight car seat transitions seamlessly from harness booster (22 - 65 lbs) to highback booster (40 - 100 lbs) to backless booster seat (40 - 100 lbs) and features the Simply Safe Adjust Harness System, which adjusts your harness and headrest to 8 height positions, with no rethreading. It features two removable cup holders to keep your child happy, and a machine washable seat pad, body insert and harness covers. Metal and plastic parts may be cleaned with mild soap and cool water.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Graco Tranzitions 3-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat Graco’s Tranzitions 3-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat is designed to grow with your child and go with you, wherever your journeys take you – from car to carpool and beyond. This lightweight car seat transitions seamlessly from harness booster (22 – 65 lb) to high back booster (40 – 100 lb) to backless booster (40 – 100 lb) and features the Simply Safe Adjust Harness System, which adjusts your harness and headrest to 8 height positions, with no rethreading. It features two removable cup holders to keep your child happy, and a machine washable seat pad, body insert and harness covers.

Features 3-in-1 harness booster helps protect your child, from toddler to youth Simply Safe Adjust Harness System headrest and harness adjust together Lightweight, portable seat is ideal for busy, active parents One-hand, 8-position adjustable headrest easily adapts for your growing child Integrated, dual cup holders help keep your child's drink close Open-loop belt guides help you correctly position your vehicle's seat belt Seat pad, body support and harness covers are comfortable and machine-washable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for smaller back seats
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Graco Tranzitions 3 in 1 Harness Booster Seat for my toddler and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. The seat is easy to install and adjust, and it provides excellent safety and comfort for my child.One of the great things about this booster seat is its versatility. It's a 3 in 1 seat, which means it can be used as a harness booster seat for younger children, a high-back booster seat for older children, and a backless booster seat for even older children. This feature will save us money in the long run, as we won't need to purchase additional booster seats as our child grows.The seat is also very comfortable for my child. The padding is plush and supportive, and the seat has multiple recline positions, which is great for long car rides. The cup holders are also a nice touch and very convenient for holding drinks and snacks.I was also pleasantly surprised by how compact this booster seat is. It was able to fit easily in the back seat of my Mustang, which has limited space, and it doesn't take up too much room when not in use.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase of the Graco Tranzitions 3 in 1 Harness Booster Seat. It's a high-quality and versatile booster seat that provides excellent safety and comfort for my child. I would highly recommend this product to any parents looking for a long-lasting and practical booster seat for their child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars There’s a reason it’s a bestseller…
reviews.reviewText: We bought a second car and I was tired of the weight of our other car seat (Diono). Also tired of needing a booster in a pinch. This one is lightweight, sturdy and convertible. Price is right too. I’m a fan of Graco products because their design is thoughtful and clearly borne of extensive experience with parents. Recommend this no nonsense five point booster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels Safe, Stays Clean
reviews.reviewText: We bought two of these for our boys due to the positive reviews and good safety ratings. Works great. Very heavy/sturdy which makes it feel very safe. Easy enough to install. Adjustable sizing is nice and has allowed it to "grow" with our kids reasonably well. Comfortable enough for naps and long road trips. Best part is the red button was too hard for my boys to release themselves, so they couldn't get out on their own. (They like to get out and play try to catch me jumping from one seat to another when they know we are in a hurry! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Car seat is nice and compact, easy for my other children to move around to get to their seats in the back of the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great seat, but ours came without cupholders.
reviews.reviewText: Great product, especially for the price. However, our package came missing the attachments for the cup holder. We spend a ton of time in the car, so that’s a problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We have 2 now...
reviews.reviewText: We tried one and loved it so much we bought a second one for our other child. This works awesome as a high back booster for our 5 year old and with harnesses for our 2 year old. It will grow with them for a very long time. Once they outgrow high back booster option you can take the back off and just use the base. Light weight, sturdy, easy to install, compact and versatile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to fall asleep
reviews.reviewText: We have 3 car seats for my little 18 month old. The other two are both upwards of $500. And this is the one my daughter falls asleep most easily in. I don’t know what it is- maybe the recline angle, or the shape or cushioning. But the car seat works in every way I need and then some. Pretty simple to install and very effective, highly recommend. Great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the fit and security of this carseat. Knowing that it will grow with the child is a huge plus. I don't transfer this seat very often. It's not difficult to secure it into the car, but once it's tightly strapped in, it's great not to have to worry about it. Buckling the child in is easy. It has one strap to pull that tightens or loosens the harness straps, making it super easy to take the child in or out. As the child grows, you simply raise the back without having to remove anything, including the seat itself. I babysat an older child the other day and was able to simple raise the back to the height of the child's shoulders, buckle her in, and pull the single strap tight. It was awesome!

Es amplio, de uso facil y muy buena tela. No se puede dormir tu bebe ya que no es reclinable pero va sentado cómodamente y se ve seguro. Me gusto mucho, por el precio me parece una excelente silla. si buscas algo practico pero seguro y a buen precio es una muy buena opción.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy enough to install, very stable, good padding
reviews.reviewText: This type of car seat not recommended for below 2yrs but we decided to use it for this car (Audi A4). I initially wanted to get Joie elevate but the padding is so thin after checking it out and changed my mind and got this. Fast delivery for Singapore. Good size. Installation is really easy if u know what you need to do, basically just latch 3 hooks. I think you can use crossbody for the seat but it’s less secure. Using the 3 hooks makes the seat super stable. Just that we only have the back hooks at the two sides so cannot put the seat in the middle. Which is fine. Cup holders are well designed for compact space

Genial precio/calidad, se adapta desde los 3 años, el hecho de que lo puedas traer con arnes, despues con cinturón y despues como booster me parece perfecto, porque hace que la compra sea aun mejor, porque te sirve por mucho tiempo y no tienes que comprar nada mas. La calidad es muy buena, tiene todos los puntos necesairos para la seguridad, es bastante comoda, claro, si se duermen se les cae la cabeza proque no se reclina, pero se entiende porque es para niños mas grandes

I was initially worried about the installation portion of the car as I've read numerous review on how hard it is to install the carseat. Since I am driving a Mini, I need a slimmer carseat, so I decided to wing it and get this.Installation was straight forward and easy (require some strength to fasten it), I used the hinge and not the seat belt.Aesthetically pleasing as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente pero deben de leer y entender instrucciones
reviews.reviewText: El asiento es bastante bueno, trae suficiente acolchado y los acabados de las costuras en general son buenos, se siente bien hecho, esté en especial podría ser el único asiento que si hijo(a) use pues se ajusta a todas las etapas, dandole un gran plus.Ahora instalar el asiento es relativamente sencillo si se sabe que se está haciendo, trae sistema LATCH (ISOFIX) que debe de estar disponible en todos los autos vendidos en norte América desde 2003, usandolo queda en 2 minutos o menos, ahora usar el cinturón del auto es un poco más engorroso y depende mucho del auto, al menos 1 de mis autos es todo un dolor de cabeza usarlo, pero eso es culpa del fabricante del automóvil no del autoasiento en si, es importante mencionar que el autoasiento está diseñado para que se use con LATCH Y CINTURON o solo uno a la vez, las instrucciones son claras y que método instalar depende más del peso del niño(a), pues por ejemplo solo se puede usar LATCH hasta 18kg(40lb) después es OBLIGATORIO el uso del cinturón del auto, ademas como el asiento es para muchas etapas se puede ajustar de muchos modos, POR FAVOR LEAN Y ENTIENDAN BIEN LAS INSTRUCCIONES POR SEGURIDAD DE SUS HIJOS.Recomiendo registrarse en la página de GRACO, pues si hay algún RECALL es el único modo de saberlo, la seguridad es primero.
